ai.vi.mobileads.api

Interface ViAd

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ViInterstitialAd, ViVideoAd

    public interface ViAd

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCallback(ViAdCallback callback)
      Adds callback to listen for ad events and errors.
      void closeAd()
      closeAd current ad.
      boolean isLoading() 
      boolean isPaused() 
      boolean isPlaying() 
      boolean isReady()

      Init loading ad.

      Removes callback to listen for ad events and errors.

      Trigger to start playing add.

    • Method Detail

      • addCallback

        void addCallback(ViAdCallback callback)
        Adds callback to listen for ad events and errors.
        Parameters:
        callback - ViAdCallback instance

      • removeCallback

        void removeCallback(ViAdCallback callback)
        Removes callback to listen for ad events and errors.
        Parameters:
        callback - ViAdCallback instance

      • startAd

        void startAd()
        Trigger to start playing add. May be triggered just after "loadAd", playback will stat after add is prepared.

      • loadAd

        void loadAd()
        Init loading ad.

      • closeAd

        void closeAd()
        closeAd current ad. Please add this call to onDestroy of your activity to guarantee release of all objects related to current ad.

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()

      • isLoading

        boolean isLoading()
